name: Dicey Rollin'
description:
Controls:

  • WASD /  Arrows : Movement
  • LMB: Long throw
  • RMB: Short throw

Description

You play as a dice hive-mind legion trying to escape the oppressive casino. As a die, you have limited senses, like vision, so you rely on your special dice senses and hearing. You can throw parts of yourself to get a sense of the surrounding area. 

You must navigate through the maze-like casino while avoiding being detected by the guards and finding the exit. Find keys and keycards to open doors (do they work) and progress through the casino while getting familiar with its intricacie.

Ingredience

  • Legion - You are playing as a legion of dice, with shining helmets and flags.
  • Atypical usage of dice - A hive mind legion of dice that sacrifice themselves for orientation in space.
  • Sense - Use special dice sense and hearing to understand your surroundings.
  • Unexpected connection - The score at the end is not what you think it is, and a few more unexpected conditions will await you behind each door.

Assets

All asset were made by members of our team with the exeption of the music.

Fun facts:

Dice sound were recorded with real dice, mouse pad, 3 pair of hands and recorded using Iphone. 

Door sound are recorded elevator door and squeaky chair.
